description: Request has missing or invalid parameters.
action: Log the full request and response for debugging. Fix the parameters. Do not retry.

description: The AWS SigV4 signature on the request is invalid.
action: Check clock skew (must be within 5 minutes of AWS time), region, and signing library configuration.

description: The LWA access token is missing, invalid, or expired.
action: Refresh the LWA access token and retry the request once. If it fails again after refresh, alert.

description: The application does not have permission to access the requested resource.
action: Check SP-API application scopes and seller authorizations. This is a configuration issue.

description: The requested resource (order, listing, report, etc.) does not exist.
action: Verify the resource ID. Dead-letter the item if the ID came from a previous API response.

description: The request rate exceeded the endpoint's token bucket limit.
action: Apply exponential backoff with jitter. Read x-amzn-RateLimit-Limit header to tune your rate limiter.

description: SP-API variant of QuotaExceeded â€” frequency of requests exceeded allowed rate.
action: Same as QuotaExceeded. Back off and retry.

description: An unexpected server-side error prevented the request from completing.
action: Retry with exponential backoff (up to 5 times). If all retries fail, dead-letter and alert.

description: SP-API is temporarily overloaded or under maintenance.
action: Retry with exponential backoff. Check the AWS Service Health Dashboard for ongoing incidents.

description: The marketplaceId provided is invalid or the seller does not operate in that marketplace.
action: Verify the marketplace ID from the fixtures. Confirm the seller account is registered in that marketplace.

description: A referenced sub-resource (e.g. a report document) was not found or has expired.
action: Report document download URLs expire after 5 minutes. Re-fetch getReportDocument if the URL has expired.
